trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class that supports automatic background pagination and tracking content positions across repaginations in addition to the methods and properties of its own base class.
trans-unit.target: 메서드 및 기본 클래스의 속성 외에도 매기기 자동 백그라운드 페이지 매김 및 추적 콘텐츠 위치를 지원 하는 추상 기본 클래스를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default, a DynamicDocumentPaginator will automatically pre-paginate content in the background (this process begins when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, which is the default setting).
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로는 DynamicDocumentPaginator는 자동으로 미리 페이지를 매기는 백그라운드에서 콘텐츠 (이 프로세스를 시작 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>은 `true`, 기본 설정).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> is `true`, the layout will also be repaginated due to changes in content or changes in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>은 `true`, 레이아웃은 또한 페이지가 다시 매겨집니다 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> 또는 콘텐츠의 변경으로 인해</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event occurs upon completion of pagination (or repagination) of one or more pages, such as in the following situations: - <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events occur as content is paginated in the background.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>이벤트 완료 될 때 발생 페이지 매김 (또는 매기) 하나 이상의 페이지의 예는 다음과 같이:- <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>콘텐츠 백그라운드에서 페이지가 매겨진에 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation, the event may occur upon paginating one or multiple pages (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> specifies which pages have been paginated).
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트는 구현에 따라 하나 또는 여러 페이지를 매길 때 발생할 수 있습니다 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> 매겨 지 해당 페이지 지정).</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - Calls to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> may cause an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event to occur if the page specified has not been paginated.
trans-unit.target: -에 대 한 호출이 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A>발생할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>이벤트를 지정 된 페이지를 매겨지지 되어 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPageAsync%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if background pagination is enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`) but pagination has only been completed up to the third page, a call of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 6 will cause pages four, five, six, and seven to be paginated.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어, 배경 페이지 매김을 사용 하는 경우 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`) 페이지 매김만 완료 된 세 번째 페이지의 호출까지 하지만 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>6의 인수와 함께 됩니다 원인 페이지 4, 5, 6 및 7 페이지가 매겨집니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Upon completion, a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event will be raised with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 4 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 4.
trans-unit.target: 완료 되 면 한 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>이벤트가 발생 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>의 설정을 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 4 및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 4.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: - With background pagination enabled (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), a change in <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> on flow-format content, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, may cause repagination and associated <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> events.
trans-unit.target: -사용 하도록 설정 하는 백그라운드 페이지 매김 사용 (<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `true`), 변경 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>흐름 형식 콘텐츠의 같은 한 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, 매기 발생할 수 있습니다 및 연결 된 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> has no effect in repagination on fixed-format content, such as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>, where the visual page size does not affect the layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>에 적용 되지 않습니다 매김 고정 형식의 내용에 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>visual 페이지 크기는 레이아웃 그대로,.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event also occurs when background pagination is disabled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>이벤트 배경 페이지 매김을 사용 하지 않도록 설정 하는 경우에 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: For example, if there is only one page of content and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A> = `false`), calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> with an argument of 0 will result in two events: 1.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 있으면 하나만 콘텐츠 페이지 및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>= `false`)를 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A>인수를 0으로 두 가지 이벤트에서 발생 합니다: 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.GetPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.IsBackgroundPaginationEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> event with <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> settings of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> = 0 and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> = 1.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>사용 하 여 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>의 설정을 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>= 0 및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>= 1.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> for the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되는 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> 지정

trans-unit.source: The object to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: 반환할 개체의 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> 입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> of the given object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 지정된 된&0;부터 시작 하는 페이지 수를 반환 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If pages prior to the `contentPosition` have not been formatted, they will be paginated synchronously prior to returning the requested page number.
trans-unit.target: 하는 경우 이전에 페이지는 `contentPosition` 적용 되지 않은 형식이 지정 매겨집니다 동기적으로 요청된 된 페이지 번호를 반환 하기 전에.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A> provides similar functionality as GetPageNumber, but with asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>비동기 작업과 GetPageNumber, 같지만 유사한 기능을 제공합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠 위치 페이지 번호가 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An representing zero-based page number where the specified contentPosition appears.
trans-unit.target: 0부터 시작 하는 페이지 번호를 나타내는 위치 지정 된 contentPosition 나타납니다.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 비동기적으로 반환 (이 통해 메서드를 발생 시킵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> 이벤트)는 지정 된&0;부터 시작 하는 페이지 번호 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The only way to cancel the asynchronous operation of this method is to cancel all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 비동기 작업을 취소 하는 유일한 방법은 모든 비동기 작업을 취소 하는 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Contrast this with the other overload of this method: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드의 다른 오버 로드를 가진 이와 반대로: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The page number is passed to the event as one of the event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 번호는 이벤트에 이벤트의 인수 중 하나로 전달 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29> for how to use this method to get the page number.
trans-unit.target: 참조 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>페이지 번호를 가져오려면이 메서드를 사용 하는 방법에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%28System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The content position whose page number is needed.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠 위치 페이지 번호가 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously, returns (through the This method raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event) the zero-based page number of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 비동기적으로 반환 (이 통해 메서드를 발생 시킵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> 이벤트)는 지정 된&0;부터 시작 하는 페이지 번호 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: 메서드의이 오버 로드를 사용 하면 모든 비동기 작업을 취소 하지 않고이 비동기 작업을 취소할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The following steps illustrate how to retrieve the page number of a given `contentPosition` asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 다음 단계에는의 페이지 번호를 검색 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 주어진 `contentPosition` 비동기적으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler> delegate and add it to be notified of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 만들기는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>대리자를 추가 하 여 알림을 받을 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Call GetPageNumberAsync specifying the `contentPosition` desired and a unique `userState` object that will be used to identify the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: GetPageNumberAsync 지정 함으로써 호출는 `contentPosition` 원하는 구성과 고유 `userState` 비동기 작업을 식별 하는 사용할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property with the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 발생 및 대리자가 호출을 하는 경우 비교는 이벤트의 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> 속성을 원래 GetPageNumberAsync `userState` 매개 변수.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> property matches the original GetPageNumberAsync `userState`, the operation is complete and the page number is ready.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> 속성이 일치 원래 GetPageNumberAsync `userState`, 작업이 완료 되 고 페이지 번호가 준비 됩니다.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> property will also match the original GetPageNumberAsync `contentPosition` parameter.) 5.
trans-unit.target: (의 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> 속성 원래 GetPageNumberAsync 일치 합니다 `contentPosition` 매개 변수.)</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.ContentPosition%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs> 5.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property contains the zero-based page number of the specified `contentPosition`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>.<xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> 지정 된&0;부터 시작 하는 페이지 번호를 포함 하는 속성 `contentPosition`.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A> provides similar functionality as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, but for synchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>유사한 기능을 제공 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>, 되지만 동기 작업에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content position element to return the page number of.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 번호를 반환 하는 콘텐츠 위치 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the asynchronous task.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업에 대 한 고유 식별자입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>완료 되었습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the position of the specified page in the document's content.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 문서 내용에 지정된 된 페이지의 위치를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The page whose position is needed.
trans-unit.target: 페이지의 위치가 필요 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A representing the position of page.
trans-unit.target: A 의 위치를 나타내는 page 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pagination is performed automatically in the background in response to certain events, such as a change in page size.
trans-unit.target: 페이지 매김의 페이지 크기 변경과 같은 특정 이벤트에 대 한 응답으로 백그라운드에서 자동으로 수행 되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When `true`, pagination is performed in the background, raising <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> events as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 때 `true`, 페이지 매기기는 백그라운드에서 수행 됩니다 발생 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted>적절 하 게 하는 이벤트입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress>

trans-unit.source: Pagination of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content, as distinct from a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> is not affected by changes to the visual <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.PageSize%2A> 시각적 개체에 대 한 변경의 영향을 받지 않는</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> 와 구별 하 여</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> 콘텐츠 페이지 매김

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if background pagination is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>배경 페이지 매김 활성화 되 면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationCompleted"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 발생 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.PaginationProgress"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when all document content has been paginated.
trans-unit.target: 모든 문서 내용에 페이지가 지정 된 경우 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When PaginationCompleted occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A> is `true` until a new pagination is initiated.
trans-unit.target: PaginationCompleted 발생할 때 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>은 `true` 새 페이지 매김 시작할 때까지.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.IsPageCountValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one or more content pages have been paginated.
trans-unit.target: 하나 이상의 콘텐츠 페이지 페이지가 지정 된 때 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs> properties <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> identify the range of pages paginated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>속성 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A>페이지가 매겨진 페이지 범위를 식별 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs.Start%2A></xref:System.Windows.Documents.PaginationProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
